labels.label: The remote branch will result in files uploaded to an instance of GM Data that is hosted in the cloud in a Grey Matter service mesh with RBAC support for remote access.
Native processor - Retrieves file content from disk and puts into the flow file for processing.
Native processor - creates flow files based upon files in a directory path with optional recursive handling.
Native processor - Assigns mime.type attribute based upon the mime type detected from file content or file name.
Native processor - Send the prepared HTTP request to GM Data. Successful response is JSON which could be further processed.
Creates user folder, any optional intermediate prefix folders, and the folders that make up the path to the file. (mkdir -p)
Custom Processor - Transform file to multipart/form-data request and assembles JSON representation of metadata.
Native processor - Send the prepared HTTP request to GM Data. Successful response is JSON which could be further processed.
Creates user folder, any optional intermediate prefix folders, and the folders that make up the path to the file. (mkdir -p)
The local branch will result in files uploaded to an instance of GM Data that is on the same server that NiFi is running on. . This simulates an on premises solution.
Custom Processor - Transform file to multipart/form-data request and assembles JSON representation of metadata.
